SELECT [u].[UrunID], [u].[Aktif], [u].[BirimID], [u].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u].[KDVOrani], [u].[KategoriID], [u].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u].[Silindi], [u].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [u].[StokMiktar], [u].[UrunAdi], [u].[UrunKodu], [t].[BirimID], [t].[Aciklama], [t].[Aktif], [t].[BirimAdi], [t].[BirimKodu], [t].[BirimSembol], [t].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t].[Silindi], [t].[SirketID], [t].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [t0].[KategoriID], [t0].[Aciklama], [t0].[Aktif], [t0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t0].[KategoriAdi], [t0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t0].[Silindi], [t0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
FROM [Urunler] AS [u]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [b].[BirimID], [b].[Aciklama], [b].[Aktif], [b].[BirimAdi], [b].[BirimKodu], [b].[BirimSembol], [b].[GuncellemeTarihi], [b].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [b].[OlusturmaTarihi], [b].[Silindi], [b].[SirketID], [b].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [Birimler] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [b].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [u].[BirimID] = [t].[BirimID]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[KategoriID], [u0].[Aciklama], [u0].[Aktif], [u0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u0].[KategoriAdi], [u0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u0].[Silindi], [u0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [UrunKategorileri] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u0].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t0] ON [u].[KategoriID] = [t0].[KategoriID]
WHERE [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
ORDER BY [u].[UrunAdi]

FROM [Faturalar] AS [f]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c].[CariID], [c].[Aciklama], [c].[Ad], [c].[Adres], [c].[AktifMi], [c].[BaslangicBakiye], [c].[CariKodu], [c].[CariTipi], [c].[Email], [c].[GuncellemeTarihi], [c].[Il], [c].[Ilce], [c].[Notlar], [c].[OlusturanKullaniciId], [c].[OlusturmaTarihi], [c].[PostaKodu], [c].[Silindi], [c].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciId], [c].[Telefon], [c].[Ulke], [c].[VergiDairesi], [c].[VergiNo], [c].[WebSitesi], [c].[Yetkili]
    FROM [Cariler] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [c].[AktifMi] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [f].[CariID] = [t].[CariID]
LEFT JOIN [FaturaTurleri] AS [f0] ON [f].[FaturaTuruID] = [f0].[FaturaTuruID]
WHERE [f].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [f].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [f].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [f].[FaturaTarihi] DESC

FROM [ParaBirimiIliskileri] AS [p]
INNER JOIN [ParaBirimleri] AS [p0] ON [p].[KaynakParaBirimiID] = [p0].[ParaBirimiID]
INNER JOIN [ParaBirimleri] AS [p1] ON [p].[HedefParaBirimiID] = [p1].[ParaBirimiID]
WHERE [p].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [p].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
ORDER BY [p0].[Kod], [p1].[Kod]

2025-03-28 06:31:36.820 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (6ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [u].[UrunID], [u].[Aktif], [u].[BirimID], [u].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u].[KDVOrani], [u].[KategoriID], [u].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u].[Silindi], [u].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [u].[StokMiktar], [u].[UrunAdi], [u].[UrunKodu], [t].[BirimID], [t].[Aciklama], [t].[Aktif], [t].[BirimAdi], [t].[BirimKodu], [t].[BirimSembol], [t].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t].[Silindi], [t].[SirketID], [t].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [t0].[KategoriID], [t0].[Aciklama], [t0].[Aktif], [t0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t0].[KategoriAdi], [t0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t0].[Silindi], [t0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
FROM [Urunler] AS [u]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [b].[BirimID], [b].[Aciklama], [b].[Aktif], [b].[BirimAdi], [b].[BirimKodu], [b].[BirimSembol], [b].[GuncellemeTarihi], [b].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [b].[OlusturmaTarihi], [b].[Silindi], [b].[SirketID], [b].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [Birimler] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [b].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [u].[BirimID] = [t].[BirimID]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[KategoriID], [u0].[Aciklama], [u0].[Aktif], [u0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u0].[KategoriAdi], [u0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u0].[Silindi], [u0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [UrunKategorileri] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u0].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t0] ON [u].[KategoriID] = [t0].[KategoriID]
WHERE [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [u].[UrunAdi]

SELECT [u].[UrunID], [u].[Aktif], [u].[BirimID], [u].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u].[KDVOrani], [u].[KategoriID], [u].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u].[Silindi], [u].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [u].[StokMiktar], [u].[UrunAdi], [u].[UrunKodu], [t].[BirimID], [t].[Aciklama], [t].[Aktif], [t].[BirimAdi], [t].[BirimKodu], [t].[BirimSembol], [t].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t].[Silindi], [t].[SirketID], [t].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [t0].[KategoriID], [t0].[Aciklama], [t0].[Aktif], [t0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t0].[KategoriAdi], [t0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t0].[Silindi], [t0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
FROM [Urunler] AS [u]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [b].[BirimID], [b].[Aciklama], [b].[Aktif], [b].[BirimAdi], [b].[BirimKodu], [b].[BirimSembol], [b].[GuncellemeTarihi], [b].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [b].[OlusturmaTarihi], [b].[Silindi], [b].[SirketID], [b].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [Birimler] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [b].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [u].[BirimID] = [t].[BirimID]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[KategoriID], [u0].[Aciklama], [u0].[Aktif], [u0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u0].[KategoriAdi], [u0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u0].[Silindi], [u0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [UrunKategorileri] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u0].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t0] ON [u].[KategoriID] = [t0].[KategoriID]
WHERE [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [u].[UrunAdi]

FROM [Urunler] AS [u]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [b].[BirimID], [b].[Aciklama], [b].[Aktif], [b].[BirimAdi], [b].[BirimKodu], [b].[BirimSembol], [b].[GuncellemeTarihi], [b].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [b].[OlusturmaTarihi], [b].[Silindi], [b].[SirketID], [b].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [Birimler] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [b].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [u].[BirimID] = [t].[BirimID]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[KategoriID], [u0].[Aciklama], [u0].[Aktif], [u0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u0].[KategoriAdi], [u0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u0].[Silindi], [u0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [UrunKategorileri] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u0].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t0] ON [u].[KategoriID] = [t0].[KategoriID]
WHERE [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [u].[UrunAdi]

SELECT [u].[UrunID], [u].[Aktif], [u].[BirimID], [u].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u].[KDVOrani], [u].[KategoriID], [u].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u].[Silindi], [u].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [u].[StokMiktar], [u].[UrunAdi], [u].[UrunKodu], [t].[BirimID], [t].[Aciklama], [t].[Aktif], [t].[BirimAdi], [t].[BirimKodu], [t].[BirimSembol], [t].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t].[Silindi], [t].[SirketID], [t].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [t0].[KategoriID], [t0].[Aciklama], [t0].[Aktif], [t0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t0].[KategoriAdi], [t0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t0].[Silindi], [t0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
FROM [Urunler] AS [u]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [b].[BirimID], [b].[Aciklama], [b].[Aktif], [b].[BirimAdi], [b].[BirimKodu], [b].[BirimSembol], [b].[GuncellemeTarihi], [b].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [b].[OlusturmaTarihi], [b].[Silindi], [b].[SirketID], [b].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [Birimler] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [b].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [u].[BirimID] = [t].[BirimID]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[KategoriID], [u0].[Aciklama], [u0].[Aktif], [u0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u0].[KategoriAdi], [u0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u0].[Silindi], [u0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [UrunKategorileri] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u0].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t0] ON [u].[KategoriID] = [t0].[KategoriID]
WHERE [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [u].[UrunAdi]

SELECT [u].[UrunID], [u].[Aktif], [u].[BirimID], [u].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u].[KDVOrani], [u].[KategoriID], [u].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u].[Silindi], [u].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [u].[StokMiktar], [u].[UrunAdi], [u].[UrunKodu], [t].[BirimID], [t].[Aciklama], [t].[Aktif], [t].[BirimAdi], [t].[BirimKodu], [t].[BirimSembol], [t].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t].[Silindi], [t].[SirketID], [t].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [t0].[KategoriID], [t0].[Aciklama], [t0].[Aktif], [t0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t0].[KategoriAdi], [t0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t0].[Silindi], [t0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
FROM [Urunler] AS [u]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [b].[BirimID], [b].[Aciklama], [b].[Aktif], [b].[BirimAdi], [b].[BirimKodu], [b].[BirimSembol], [b].[GuncellemeTarihi], [b].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [b].[OlusturmaTarihi], [b].[Silindi], [b].[SirketID], [b].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [Birimler] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [b].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [u].[BirimID] = [t].[BirimID]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[KategoriID], [u0].[Aciklama], [u0].[Aktif], [u0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u0].[KategoriAdi], [u0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u0].[Silindi], [u0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [UrunKategorileri] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u0].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t0] ON [u].[KategoriID] = [t0].[KategoriID]
WHERE [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [u].[UrunAdi]

SELECT [u].[UrunID], [u].[Aktif], [u].[BirimID], [u].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u].[KDVOrani], [u].[KategoriID], [u].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u].[Silindi], [u].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [u].[StokMiktar], [u].[UrunAdi], [u].[UrunKodu], [t].[BirimID], [t].[Aciklama], [t].[Aktif], [t].[BirimAdi], [t].[BirimKodu], [t].[BirimSembol], [t].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t].[Silindi], [t].[SirketID], [t].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [t0].[KategoriID], [t0].[Aciklama], [t0].[Aktif], [t0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t0].[KategoriAdi], [t0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t0].[Silindi], [t0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
FROM [Urunler] AS [u]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [b].[BirimID], [b].[Aciklama], [b].[Aktif], [b].[BirimAdi], [b].[BirimKodu], [b].[BirimSembol], [b].[GuncellemeTarihi], [b].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [b].[OlusturmaTarihi], [b].[Silindi], [b].[SirketID], [b].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [Birimler] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [b].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [u].[BirimID] = [t].[BirimID]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[KategoriID], [u0].[Aciklama], [u0].[Aktif], [u0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u0].[KategoriAdi], [u0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u0].[Silindi], [u0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [UrunKategorileri] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u0].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t0] ON [u].[KategoriID] = [t0].[KategoriID]
WHERE [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [u].[UrunAdi]

SELECT [u].[UrunID], [u].[Aktif], [u].[BirimID], [u].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u].[KDVOrani], [u].[KategoriID], [u].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u].[Silindi], [u].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [u].[StokMiktar], [u].[UrunAdi], [u].[UrunKodu], [t].[BirimID], [t].[Aciklama], [t].[Aktif], [t].[BirimAdi], [t].[BirimKodu], [t].[BirimSembol], [t].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t].[Silindi], [t].[SirketID], [t].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [t0].[KategoriID], [t0].[Aciklama], [t0].[Aktif], [t0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t0].[KategoriAdi], [t0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [t0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t0].[Silindi], [t0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
FROM [Urunler] AS [u]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [b].[BirimID], [b].[Aciklama], [b].[Aktif], [b].[BirimAdi], [b].[BirimKodu], [b].[BirimSembol], [b].[GuncellemeTarihi], [b].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [b].[OlusturmaTarihi], [b].[Silindi], [b].[SirketID], [b].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [Birimler] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [b].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [u].[BirimID] = [t].[BirimID]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[KategoriID], [u0].[Aciklama], [u0].[Aktif], [u0].[GuncellemeTarihi], [u0].[KategoriAdi], [u0].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [u0].[OlusturmaTarihi], [u0].[Silindi], [u0].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID]
    FROM [UrunKategorileri] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u0].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t0] ON [u].[KategoriID] = [t0].[KategoriID]
WHERE [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [u].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [u].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [u].[UrunAdi]

VALUES (i.[Aciklama], i.[ApplicationUserId], i.[Basarili], i.[HataMesaji], i.[IPAdresi], i.[IslemTarihi], i.[IslemTuru], i.[KayitAdi], i.[KayitID], i.[KullaniciAdi], i.[KullaniciID], i.[LogID], i.[LogTuru], i.[LogTuruInt], i.[Mesaj], i.[OlusturmaTarihi], i.[Sayfa], i.[TabloAdi])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position;

SELECT [f].[FaturaID], [f].[Aktif], [f].[AraToplam], [f].[CariID], [f].[DovizKuru], [f].[DovizTuru], [f].[FaturaNotu], [f].[FaturaNumarasi], [f].[FaturaTarihi], [f].[FaturaTuruID], [f].[GenelToplam], [f].[GuncellemeTarihi], [f].[KDVToplam], [f].[OdemeDurumu], [f].[OdemeTuruID], [f].[OlusturanKullaniciID], [f].[OlusturmaTarihi], [f].[Resmi], [f].[Silindi], [f].[SiparisNumarasi], [f].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID], [f].[VadeTarihi], [t].[CariID], [t].[Aciklama], [t].[Ad], [t].[Adres], [t].[AktifMi], [t].[BaslangicBakiye], [t].[CariKodu], [t].[CariTipi], [t].[Email], [t].[GuncellemeTarihi], [t].[Il], [t].[Ilce], [t].[Notlar], [t].[OlusturanKullaniciId], [t].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t].[PostaKodu], [t].[Silindi], [t].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciId], [t].[Telefon], [t].[Ulke], [t].[VergiDairesi], [t].[VergiNo], [t].[WebSitesi], [t].[Yetkili], [f0].[FaturaTuruID], [f0].[FaturaTuruAdi], [f0].[HareketTuru]
FROM [Faturalar] AS [f]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c].[CariID], [c].[Aciklama], [c].[Ad], [c].[Adres], [c].[AktifMi], [c].[BaslangicBakiye], [c].[CariKodu], [c].[CariTipi], [c].[Email], [c].[GuncellemeTarihi], [c].[Il], [c].[Ilce], [c].[Notlar], [c].[OlusturanKullaniciId], [c].[OlusturmaTarihi], [c].[PostaKodu], [c].[Silindi], [c].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciId], [c].[Telefon], [c].[Ulke], [c].[VergiDairesi], [c].[VergiNo], [c].[WebSitesi], [c].[Yetkili]
    FROM [Cariler] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [c].[AktifMi] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [f].[CariID] = [t].[CariID]
LEFT JOIN [FaturaTurleri] AS [f0] ON [f].[FaturaTuruID] = [f0].[FaturaTuruID]
WHERE [f].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [f].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [f].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [f].[FaturaTarihi] DESC

FROM [Faturalar] AS [f]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c].[CariID], [c].[Aciklama], [c].[Ad], [c].[Adres], [c].[AktifMi], [c].[BaslangicBakiye], [c].[CariKodu], [c].[CariTipi], [c].[Email], [c].[GuncellemeTarihi], [c].[Il], [c].[Ilce], [c].[Notlar], [c].[OlusturanKullaniciId], [c].[OlusturmaTarihi], [c].[PostaKodu], [c].[Silindi], [c].[SonGuncelleyenKullaniciId], [c].[Telefon], [c].[Ulke], [c].[VergiDairesi], [c].[VergiNo], [c].[WebSitesi], [c].[Yetkili]
    FROM [Cariler] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [c].[AktifMi] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [f].[CariID] = [t].[CariID]
LEFT JOIN [FaturaTurleri] AS [f0] ON [f].[FaturaTuruID] = [f0].[FaturaTuruID]

2025-03-28 12:54:20.338 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[IrsaliyeID], [t].[IrsaliyeNumarasi], [t].[IrsaliyeTarihi], [t].[CariID], [t0].[Ad] AS [CariAdi], [t].[FaturaID], CASE
    WHEN [t1].[FaturaID] IS NOT NULL THEN [t1].[FaturaNumarasi]
    ELSE N''
END AS [FaturaNumarasi], [t].[IrsaliyeTuru], [t].[Aciklama], (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM([i0].[BirimFiyat] * [i0].[Miktar]), 0.0)
    FROM [IrsaliyeDetaylari] AS [i0]
    WHERE [i0].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[IrsaliyeID] = [i0].[IrsaliyeID]) AS [ToplamTutar], [t].[Aktif], [t].[OlusturmaTarihi], [t].[GuncellemeTarihi]
FROM (
    SELECT [i].[IrsaliyeID], [i].[Aciklama], [i].[Aktif], [i].[CariID], [i].[FaturaID], [i].[GuncellemeTarihi], [i].[IrsaliyeNumarasi], [i].[IrsaliyeTarihi], [i].[IrsaliyeTuru], [i].[OlusturmaTarihi]
    FROM [Irsaliyeler] AS [i]
    WHERE [i].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [i].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [i].[IrsaliyeTarihi] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [c].[CariID], [c].[Ad]
    FROM [Cariler] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [c].[AktifMi] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t0] ON [t].[CariID] = [t0].[CariID]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [f].[FaturaID], [f].[FaturaNumarasi]
    FROM [Faturalar] AS [f]
    WHERE [f].[Silindi] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [f].[Aktif] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t1] ON [t].[FaturaID] = [t1].[FaturaID]
ORDER BY [t].[IrsaliyeTarihi] DESC

DECLARE @var1 sysname;
SELECT @var1 = [d].[name]
FROM [sys].[default_constraints] [d]
INNER JOIN [sys].[columns] [c] ON [d].[parent_column_id] = [c].[column_id] AND [d].[parent_object_id] = [c].[object_id]
WHERE ([d].[parent_object_id] = OBJECT_ID(N'[AspNetUsers]') AND [c].[name] = N'SoftDelete');
IF @var1 IS NOT NULL EXEC(N'ALTER TABLE [AspNetUsers] DROP CONSTRAINT [' + @var1 + '];');
ALTER TABLE [AspNetUsers] DROP COLUMN [SoftDelete];
2025-03-28 13:04:51.523 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (14ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                    IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('Urunler') AND name = 'SoftDelete')
                    BEGIN
                        UPDATE Urunler SET Silindi = SoftDelete WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('Urunler') AND name = 'Silindi');
                        ALTER TABLE Urunler DROP COLUMN SoftDelete;
                    END

                    IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('Birimler') AND name = 'SoftDelete')
                    BEGIN
                        UPDATE Birimler SET Silindi = SoftDelete WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('Birimler') AND name = 'Silindi');

                        UPDATE Urunler SET Silindi = SoftDelete WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('Urunler') AND name = 'Silindi');

                    END
